title: Good could be excellent
comment: Incorporating lua scripts would mark it beautiful. In fact. Don't think another U.I. would beat it. Proving not too resource intensive.

title: Great!
comment: Congky everywhere First on my mint desktop Now on on my android phone :D Now waiting for widget version

title: Randomly exits
comment: The app is great, however it closes unexpectedly seceral times a day and doesn't restart. To activatr it again I have to select some other wallpaper, apply and select Moss wallpaper once again.

title: Excellent!
comment: Would like to see this in widget version.

title: Love it but needs to be a widget
comment: Sure the dev has a good reason for going the live wallpaper route, but it srsly needs to be a widget. If that's done i can see this being in the top 10. Buying pretend shares now....

title: No cpu info
comment: No cpu info at all is displayed Htc sensation. Android 4.0.3

title: Moss
comment: How do I configure moss with *.mpk files, can anyone help me?

title: According to author:
comment: .mpk files downloadable through website samples are zip files that can be associated to moss. Configs can be edited by renaming it to *.zip and then modifying files. Author was very helpful! SGS2
It's a great wallpaper if your going for the clunky look. It happens to fit my theme perfect and I love it.
